sourcesContent:
/** * @module Results * @description Main results component that displays the final rankings of cat names. * Shows the tournament results with ratings and provides option to restart. * * @example * handleRestart()} * /> * * @component * @param {Object} props * @param {Object} props.ratings - Object mapping cat names to their Elo ratings * @param {Function} props.onRestart - Callback function to restart the tournament * @returns {JSX.Element} Results view with rankings and restart option */ import React from 'react'; import ResultsTable from './ResultsTable'; import './Results.css'; function Results({ ratings, onStartNew, userName }) { return (

Your Cat Name Rankings

Here are your ranked cat names, {userName}! You can start a new tournament with different names or continue rating to refine your rankings.

Starting a new tournament will let you rate more names while keeping your current rankings.

); } export default Results;
